summary.span: 提供对定义消息队列消息所需的属性的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the properties needed to define a Message Queuing message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要查看或从队列接收消息，或向队列发送消息时具有很好的控制消息属性的类。Use the class to peek or receive messages from a queue, or to have fine control over message properties when sending a message to a queue. 使用类在扫视或接收来自队列的消息时，因为同时和方法创建的新实例类，然后设置实例的属性。 uses the class when it peeks or receives messages from queues, because both the and methods create a new instance of the class and set the instance's properties. 类的只读属性适用于从队列检索消息时的读/写属性适用于发送和检索消息。The class's read-only properties apply to retrieving messages from a queue, while the read/write properties apply to sending and retrieving messages. 当扫视或接收来自队列的消息其属性确定消息的属性中哪些检索。When peeks or receives a message from a queue, its property determines which of the message's properties are retrieved. 类的方法允许你指定发送到该队列的消息的任何对象类型。The class's method allows you to specify any object type for a message being sent to that queue. 你可以使用实例的属性指定的泛型消息发送到队列设置。You can use the instance's property to specify settings for generic messages sent to the queue. 类型的设置包括格式化程序、 标签、 加密和身份验证。The types of settings include formatter, label, encryption, and authentication. 你还可以指定的相应值成员在协调消息传送应用程序以响应确认消息和报告消息时。You can also specify values for the appropriate members when you coordinate your messaging application to respond to acknowledgment and report messages. 使用实例向队列发送一条消息可以灵活地访问和修改其中的许多属性-对单个消息或消息的消息的基础上。Using a instance to send a message to the queue gives you the flexibility to access and modify many of these properties—either for a single message or on a message-by-message basis. 属性优先于。 properties take precedence over . 消息数据存储在属性和较小的范围内，和属性。Message data is stored in the property and to a lesser extent, the and properties. 消息数据已加密、 序列化或反序列化的内容属性会受到影响。When message data is encrypted, serialized, or deserialized, only the contents of the property are affected. 内容序列化属性，当使用发送消息时你指定的属性。The contents of the property are serialized when the message is sent, using the property you specify. 在中找到的序列化的内容属性。The serialized contents are found in the property. 你还可以设置属性直接，例如，若要将文件作为一条消息的数据内容发送。You can also set the property directly, for example, to send a file as the data content of a message. 你可以更改或属性任何时间之前发送的消息和数据时将进行序列化相应地在调用时。You can change the or properties at any time before sending the message, and the data will be serialized appropriately when you call . 属性定义属性仅适用于消息并不属于类型。The properties defined by the property apply only to messages that are not of type . 如果指定属性，则具有相同的名称中的属性实例发送到该队列原因要忽略这些默认属性。If you specify the property for a , the identically named properties in a instance sent to that queue cause these default properties to be ignored. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了格式设置消息正文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了格式设置消息正文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[Message.Body#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Body/CPP/message_sendreceive.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Body#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Body/CS/message_sendreceive.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Body#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Body/VB/message_sendreceive.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载来创建的新实例具有空主体的类。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that has an empty body. 指定属性或属性在发送之前对象。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 属性可以是任何可序列化的对象，如文本字符串、 结构对象、 类实例或嵌入的对象。The property can be any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object. 除非你将写入消息的内容直接属性，设置属性后，发送消息。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 正文将序列使用属性的值时方法调用实例。The body is serialized using the property's value at the time the method is called on the instance. 松散耦合的因此不需要时使用此格式键入发送方和接收方将相同对象。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 1.0 版Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider version 1.0| ||`CryptoProviderType.RSA_FULL`| ||`null`| ||`Stream.null`| ||00| ||`Guid.Empty`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||一个零长度的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||一个零长度的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||一个零长度的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`XmlMessageFormatter`| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字符串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||一个零长度的字节数组A zero-length array of bytes| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同的优先级别的消息发送到队列，并随后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes AcknowledgeType { System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes get(); void set(System::Messaging::AcknowledgeTypes value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置返回给发送应用程序的确认消息的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of acknowledgment message to be returned to the sending application.

value.span: 值之一，该值表示系统在管理队列中传递的确认消息类型，以及在何种条件下将确认消息返回发送应用程序。

span.span: One of the values, which represent both the types of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue and the conditions under which acknowledgments are returned to the sending application.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定发送应用程序请求的确认消息的类型。The property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application. 设置发送消息以请求特定事件的通知之前的属性 — 例如，消息到达其目标队列、 正在检索消息或阻止一条消息到达或从正在检索的超时目标队列中。Set the property before sending the message to request notification of certain occurrences—for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue. 消息队列的确认将消息发送到返回通知指定原始消息属性。Message Queuing returns notification by sending acknowledgment messages to the property specified by the original message. 确认消息的属性指示确认它所表示的类型。An acknowledgment message's property indicates the type of acknowledgment that it represents. 例如，如果发送确认消息，因为消息未到达之前目标间隔过期，的确认消息的属性将包含值`ReachQueueTimeout`。For example, if an acknowledgment message was sent because a message did not reach the destination before the interval expired, the property of the acknowledgment message would contain the value `ReachQueueTimeout`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收一条包含订单到和从队列消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

exception.span: 消息经过筛选后忽略了 属性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Acknowledgment As Acknowledgment
public: property System::Messaging::Acknowledgment Acknowledgment { System::Messaging::Acknowledgment get(); };

summary.span: 获取该消息表示的确认分类。

span.span: Gets the classification of acknowledgment that this message represents.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将收到来自管理队列时，读取属性以验证原始消息的状态。When you receive a message from an administration queue, read the property to verify the status of the original message. 当消息发送到其目标队列时，消息队列可以请求将数据发送确认消息。When a message is sent to its destination queue, Message Queuing can be requested to post an acknowledgment message. 例如，使用消息到达并被检索在指定超时值，也可能表明发生了什么错误传递失败的情况下，可以指示此类消息。Such a message can indicate, for example, whether the message arrived and was retrieved within specified time-outs, or it can indicate what went wrong in the case of delivery failure. 目标队列返回确认消息，并将其发布到原始消息中指定的管理队列属性。The destination queue returns acknowledgment messages and posts them to the administration queue specified in the original message's property. 的确认消息的属性标识的确认消息，不是原始消息。The property of an acknowledgment message identifies the acknowledgment message, not the original message. 你可以在该确认找到原始消息的标识符实例的属性。You can find the identifier of the original message in the acknowledgment instance's property. 如果此实例表示发送确认消息，属性指定的确认类型。If this instance represents an acknowledgment message, the property specifies the type of acknowledgment. 否则为属性包含值`Normal`。Otherwise, the property contains the value `Normal`. 使用以指定将在其下返回确认的情况的原始消息的属性。Use the property of the original message to specify the circumstances under which acknowledgments will be returned.

exception.span: 消息尚未发送。

value.span: ，指定用于系统生成的确认消息的管理队列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的队列属性可以是任何非事务性队列。The queue specified in the property can be any non-transactional queue. 发送到管理队列的确认消息可以指示原始消息是否到达了目标队列，以及是否被从该队列中移除。The acknowledgment messages sent to the administration queue can indicate whether the original message reached its destination queue and whether it was removed from the queue. 当属性以外的任何值`None`，发送应用程序必须指定要用作管理队列的队列。When the property has any value other than `None`, the sending application must specify the queue to use as the administration queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收一条包含订单到和从队列消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含可用于组织不同类型的消息的应用程序特定信息。The property contains application-specific information that you can use to organize different types of messages. 例如，可使用应用程序特定的索引。For example, you can use application-specific indexes. 要解释的应用程序负责属性信息。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret property information. 只要有可能，应将消息数据包含在消息的正文中而不是属性。Whenever possible, you should include message data in the body of the message rather than the property. 在使用外部队列，使用属性指定在消息队列中不存在的消息属性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify message properties that do not exist in Message Queuing. 与属性，它是要了解的内容的应用程序的责任属性。As with the property, it is the responsibility of the application to understand the content of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是表示发送用户的标识符的字节数组。The property is an array of bytes that represents the identifier of the sending user. 发件人 ID 由消息队列设置，并且用于通过接收队列管理器来验证发件人是否有权访问队列。The sender ID is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. 发件人 ID，则发送应用程序，消息队列应不验证消息的发件人，也不验证发件人的访问权限表示缺少权限到接收队列。The absence of the sender ID is an indication by the sending application that Message Queuing should not validate the message's sender nor verify the sender's access rights to the receiving queue. 值得仅当消息已验证时它已达到目标队列。The is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated when it reached the destination queue. 消息队列接受仅经过身份验证的消息，并且如果到达目标队列时被拒绝或属性是`false`。The message is rejected when it reaches the destination queue if the queue accepts only authenticated messages and either the or the property is `false`. > [!CAUTION] > 如果消息被拒绝，它或者被发送到死信队列 (如果是`true`)，或它将被忽略。If a message is rejected, it is either sent to the dead-letter queue (if is `true`), or it is ignored. 当一条消息未能到达队列时，你可以请求确认。You can request acknowledgments when a message fails to reach a queue. 否则为在是`false`消息可能会丢失而不发出警告。Otherwise, when is `false` the message might be lost without warning. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性只由应用程序时它是与消息交互，并尝试确定是否已请求身份验证。The property is used only by the application while it is interacting with the message and trying to determine if authentication was requested. 如果消息已在队列中，消息已验证。If the message is in the queue, the message was authenticated. 相反，如果属性是`true`，接收队列管理器身份验证消息，当收到该消息。Conversely, if the property is `true`, the receiving Queue Manager authenticated the message when it received that message. 无法确定消息是否未通过查看其属性通过身份验证。You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties. 消息队列丢弃身份验证失败之前它们传递到队列的消息。Message Queuing discards messages that fail authentication before they are delivered to the queue. 但是，你可以请求如果传送失败防止消息到达队列中，会发送确认消息。However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents the message from arriving in the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用时使用外部队列。You typically use the when working with foreign queues. 消息队列需要的身份验证提供程序名称和加密服务提供程序 （身份验证提供程序） 来验证发送到外部队列的消息和消息传递给消息的数字签名的身份验证提供程序类型从外队列的队列。Message Queuing requires the authentication provider name and authentication provider type of the cryptographic provider (authentication provider) to validate the digital signatures of both messages sent to a foreign queue and messages passed to Message Queuing from a foreign queue. 发送邮件时，始终设置和属性组合在一起。When sending a message, always set the and properties together. 如果连接器类型还未设置，发送消息，消息队列将忽略身份验证提供程序名称。When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the authentication provider name if the connector type is not also set. 属性不能为`null`，但它可以是空字符串 ("")。The property cannot be `null`, but it can be an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用时使用外部的队列，以指定的加密服务提供程序是与消息关联的属性。You typically use the property when working with foreign queues to specify which cryptographic service provider is associated with a message. 消息队列需要的身份验证提供程序名称和加密服务提供程序 （身份验证提供程序） 来验证发送到外部队列的消息和消息传递给消息的数字签名的身份验证提供程序类型从外队列的队列。Message Queuing requires the authentication provider name and authentication provider type of the cryptographic provider (authentication provider) to validate the digital signatures of both messages sent to a foreign queue and messages passed to Message Queuing from a foreign queue. 仅`RsaFull`旨在与消息一起使用。Only `RsaFull` is intended to be used with messaging. 发送邮件时，始终设置和属性组合在一起。When sending a message, always set the and properties together. 如果连接器类型还未设置，发送消息，消息队列将忽略的身份验证提供程序类型。When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the authentication provider type if the connector type is not also set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息的属性通常包含与消息关联的数据。The message's property usually contains the data associated with the message. 虽然你还可以发送应用程序特定数据和属性，您应包含在消息数据只要有可能的消息。Although you can also send application-specific data in the and properties, you should include message data in the of the message whenever possible. 仅属性内容将被序列化或加密。Only the property contents are serialized or encrypted. 属性可以包含任何对象，其大小不超过 4 MB。The property can contain any object whose size does not exceed 4 MB. 如果你使用发送的类型不是任何对象到，该对象将位于属性返回实例或。If you use to send any object that is not of type to the , that object will be located in the property of the instance returned by or . 中的字符串自变量`MessageQueue.Send("hello.")`是一个示例是一般的对象。The string argument in `MessageQueue.Send("hello.")` is an example of such a generic object. 属性指示消息正文中存储的信息的类型。The property indicates the type of information that is stored in the message body. 消息队列使用此信息来标识的类型属性内容。Message Queuing uses this information to identify the type of the property contents. 指定属性或属性在发送之前对象。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 属性可以是任何可序列化对象，例如文本字符串、 结构对象、 类实例或嵌入的对象。The property can be any serializable object, such as a text string, structure object, class instance, or embedded object. 除非你将写入消息的内容直接属性，设置属性后，发送消息。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 当方法调用实例，正文使用序列化格式化程序中包含属性。When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果你发送消息时未指定的值属性，格式化程序默认值为。If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . > [!NOTE] > 尝试设置到的消息正文将导致时`Send`方法类称为和使用。Attempting to set the body of a message to will cause a when the `Send` method of the class is called and the is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同的优先级别的消息发送到队列，并随后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一条消息的主体可以包含的任何类型的信息 —，字符串、 日期、 货币、 数字、 字节，数组或任何托管的对象。The body of a message can consist of any type of information—for example, a string, a date, a currency, a number, an array of bytes, or any managed object. 此信息序列化为要传递给队列。This information is serialized into a to be passed to the queue. 指定属性或属性在发送之前对象。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 如果你设置属性，内容序列化到属性。If you set the property, the contents are serialized into the property. 但是，您可以选择编写直接属性。However, you can choose to write the property directly. 这很有用，例如，如果想要打开的连接到文件并将其内容序列作为你的消息的正文。This is useful, for example, when you want to open a connection to a file and stream its contents as the body of your message. 除非你将写入消息的内容直接属性，设置属性后，发送消息。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 当方法调用实例，正文使用序列化格式化程序中包含属性。When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果你发送消息时未指定的值属性，格式化程序默认值为。If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . 如果你设置属性`true`为此消息的正文，消息将被加密发送时，不是在你设置时属性。If you set the property to `true` for the body of this message, the message will be encrypted when it is sent, not when you set the property. 因此，永远不会加密属性。Therefore, the property is never encrypted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列要求属性设置只要应用程序设置通常由消息队列设置的消息属性。Message Queuing requires the property be set whenever an application sets a message property that is usually set by Message Queuing. 应用程序通常使用在以下两种情况：An application typically uses a in the following two cases: - 每当连接器应用程序将消息传递。Whenever a connector application passes a message. 告知如何解释消息的安全性和确认属性的发送和接收应用程序。The tells the sending and receiving applications how to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message. - 每当发送应用程序，而不是消息队列，加密消息。Whenever the sending application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message. 通知消息队列使用要对消息进行解密的属性值。The tells Message Queuing to use the property value to decrypt the message. 必须设置属性如果设置了任何以下属性 （否则，队列将忽略这些属性在发送邮件时）：You must set the property if you set any of the following properties (otherwise, the queue ignores these properties when the message is sent): - - - - - -

span.span: The correlation identifier is used by Message Queuing when it generates an acknowledgment or report message, and by an application when it generates a response message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列生成确认或报告消息时，它将使用相关标识符属性来指定原始消息的消息标识符。When Message Queuing generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses the correlation identifier property to specify the message identifier of the original message. 这样，相关标识符就可将报告或确认消息与原始消息关联起来。In this manner, the correlation identifier ties the report or acknowledgment message to the original message. 发送应用程序然后可以进行匹配将确认或报告与原始消息通过使用属性来标识原始消息的属性。The sending application can then match the acknowledgment or report with the original message by using the property to identify the original message's property. 连接器应用程序还必须设置原始消息的消息标识符的确认消息和报告消息的属性。Connector applications also must set the property of the acknowledgment and report messages to the message identifier of the original message. 当你的应用程序将响应消息发送到发送应用程序时，您可以设置的响应消息写入原始消息的消息标识符的属性。When your application sends a response message to the sending application, you can set the property of the response message to the message identifier of the original message. 然后，发送应用程序可以将响应消息与已发送的消息进行匹配。The sending application can then match your response message to the message that was sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单与队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. summary.span: 获取或设置用于对应用程序加密的消息或发送到外部队列的消息进行加密的对称密钥。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两种方案需要使用属性。Two scenarios require you to use the property. 第一种是当你应用程序，而不是消息队列，对消息进行加密。The first is when your application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message. 第二个是当将加密的消息发送到以外消息队列的队列系统。The second is when you send an encrypted message to a queuing system other than Message Queuing. 设置此属性之前，必须对接收队列管理器的公共密钥的对称密钥进行加密。Before you set this property, you must encrypt the symmetric key with the public key of the receiving queue manager. 当你发送应用程序加密的消息时，接收队列管理器使用对称密钥对消息发送到其目标队列之前进行解密。When you send an application-encrypted message, the receiving queue manager uses the symmetric key to decrypt the message before sending it to its destination queue. 如果向外队列发送一条消息，将加密的消息转发到接收应用程序的附加对称密钥与相应的连接器应用程序先接收消息。If you send a message to a foreign queue, the message is first received by the appropriate connector application, which forwards the encrypted message with the attached symmetric key to the receiving application. 然后，它是接收应用程序中，可以对消息使用的对称密钥进行解密的责任。It is then the responsibility of the receiving application to decrypt the message using the symmetric key. 当你将设置属性，还必须设置属性。When you set the property, you must also set the property. 发送消息，消息队列会忽略属性如果还未设置属性。When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the property if the property is not also set. 属性具有的最大数组大小为 256。The property has a maximum array size of 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已发送的消息队列版本 1.0 的消息进行身份验证时，消息队列将使用数字签名。Message Queuing uses the digital signature when authenticating messages that were sent by Message Queuing version 1.0. 在大多数情况下，消息队列生成，并设置发送应用程序请求身份验证时的属性。In most cases, Message Queuing generates and sets the property when the sending application requests authentication. 接收应用程序使用此属性来检索附加到消息的数字签名。The receiving application uses this property to retrieve the digital signature attached to the message. 你只能使用属性时运行消息队列 2.0 版。You can only use the property when running Message Queuing version 2.0. 请求身份验证时，发送应用程序必须指定消息队列 1.0 版签名。The sending application must specify Message Queuing version 1.0 signatures when requesting authentication. 如果发送应用程序发送的消息队列 2.0 版签名，此属性将包含四个字节，每个包含零的缓冲区。If the sending application sends a Message Queuing version 2.0 signature, this property contains a buffer of four bytes, each containing zero. 一起使用属性，也使用连接器应用程序发送一条消息时。The property, together with the property, is also used by connector applications when a message is sent. 在此方案中，连接器应用程序，而不是消息队列-生成的数字签名，它将根据发送消息的用户的证书。In this scenario, the connector application—rather than Message Queuing—generates the digital signature, which it bases on the certificate of the user sending the message. 属性具有的最大数组大小为 256。The property has a maximum array size of 256. 当你将设置属性，还必须设置属性。When you set the property, you must also set the property. 在发送一条消息，消息队列会忽略属性如果还未设置属性。When a message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the property if the property is not also set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是私有 （加密），则消息前发送和在接收时解密被加密。If a message is private (encrypted), it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted upon receipt. 属性指定用于加密私有消息的消息正文的算法。The property specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. 队列可以要求该传入消息进行加密。A queue can require that incoming messages be encrypted. 如果应用程序的非加密 （非专用） 消息发送到的队列，只接受私有消息，或如果它将私有消息发送到队列，只接受非私有消息，队列将拒绝该消息。If an application sends a non-encrypted (non-private) message to a queue that accepts only private messages, or if it sends a private message to a queue that accepts only non-private messages, the queue rejects the message. 发送应用程序可以请求，这种情况下会返回否定确认消息。The sending application can request that a negative acknowledgment message be returned in such a case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供有关应用程序定义的信息，如与消息关联的大型二进制对象。The property provides for application-defined information, like a large binary object, that is associated with the message. 它负责接收应用程序可以解释的内容属性。It is the responsibility of the receiving application to interpret the contents of the property. 如果可能，应包含在消息数据消息的属性而不是属性。Where possible, you should include message data in the property of the message rather than the property. 在使用外部队列，使用属性指定在消息队列中不存在的消息属性。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify message properties that do not exist in Message Queuing. 非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中不存在外队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. 与此类通过连接器应用程序的队列，消息队列进行通信。Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性时读取和写入一条消息。Use the property when reading and writing a message. 当消息发送到队列时，序列化格式化程序属性转换成可以发送到消息队列的流。When a message is sent to the queue, the formatter serializes the property into a stream that can be sent to the message queue. 当从队列中读取，格式化程序反序列化到消息数据属性。When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the property. 除非你将写入消息的内容直接属性，设置属性后，发送消息。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 当方法调用实例，正文使用序列化格式化程序中包含属性。When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果你发送消息时未指定的值属性，格式化程序默认值为。If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . 松散耦合的因此不需要时使用此格式键入发送方和接收方将相同对象。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和数据序列化为二进制表示形式。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 发送或接收 COM 组件时使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了格式设置消息正文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . value.span: 消息的唯一标识符，由消息队列生成。

span.span: The message's unique identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发送消息时，消息队列会生成消息标识符。Message Queuing generates a message identifier when the message is sent. 标识符由 20 个字节组成，包括两个项： 机发送计算机和计算机上消息的唯一标识符。The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two items: the machine of the sending computer and a unique identifier for the message on the computer. 这两项组合在一起，就产生了一个在网络上唯一的消息标识符。The combination of the two items produces a message identifier that is unique on the network. 消息队列会生成的所有消息的消息标识符 — 包括确认消息和报告消息。Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages—including acknowledgment and report messages. 确认消息通常由消息队列发送响应的到达或失败的原始、 发送消息。An acknowledgment message is generally sent by Message Queuing in reaction to the arrival or failure of an original, sent message. 你可以找到属性值中的原始消息的确认消息的属性。You can find the property value of the original message in the property of an acknowledgment message. 你还可以使用属性时将响应消息发送到响应队列。You can also use the property when sending a response message to a response queue. 若要将响应消息中包含的原始消息的标识符，设置到响应消息的属性原始消息的属性。To include the identifier of the original message in a response message, set the property of the response message to the property of the original message. 然后可以在读取响应消息的应用程序中使用响应消息的相关标识符来标识原始消息。The application reading the response message can then use the correlation identifier of the response message to identify the original message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收一条包含订单到和从队列消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它特别请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和需要一个值，指定超时。对于前者，超时是允许从队列接收消息的最长时间。 and require a value that specifies a time-out. For the former, the time-out is the maximum time allowed for a message to be received from the queue. 对于后者，该超时是消息到达队列所允许的时间。For the latter, the time-out is the time allowed for a message to reach the queue. 在这两种情况下，你可以作为的秒数指定的超时或使用，指示无超时存在。In both cases, you can specify the time-out as a number of seconds or use to indicate that no time-out exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将字段。The following code example demonstrates the use of the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用属性以验证消息已发送到单个队列单个事务中的第一个消息。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was the first message sent in a single transaction to a single queue. 此属性是仅适用于消息队列版本 2.0 及更高版本。This property is available only with Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 若要验证事务边界，你可以使用属性以及其他两个属性：和。To verify transaction boundaries, you can use the property along with two other properties: and . 前者用于检查消息是否已在该事务中发送的最后一条消息，并使用后者来检索事务的标识符。Use the former to check whether a message was the last message sent in the transaction, and use the latter to retrieve the identifier of the transaction. 如果只在事务中，发送一条消息和属性都设置为`true`。If only one message is sent in a transaction, the and properties are both set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用属性以验证消息已发送到单个队列单个事务中的最后一条消息。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was the last message sent in a single transaction to a single queue. 此属性是仅适用于消息队列版本 2.0 及更高版本。This property is available only with Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 若要验证事务边界，你可以使用属性以及其他两个属性：和。To verify transaction boundaries, you can use the property along with two other properties: and . 前者用于检查消息是否已在该事务中发送的第一个消息，并使用后者来检索事务的标识符。Use the former to check whether a message was the first message sent in the transaction, and use the latter to retrieve the identifier of the transaction. 如果只在事务中，发送一条消息和属性都设置为`true`。If only one message is sent in a transaction, the and properties are both set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息标签有多种用途。You can use a message label for several purposes. 例如，可用于显示消息，或根据标签值有选择地处理消息。For example, you can use it for display purposes or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 标签不必是唯一的消息范围内。The label does not need to be unique across messages. 消息队列和消息标签表示一个应用程序定义的值，可利用该值将标识队列或消息用人可识别的词条标识出来。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 它负责解释标签的内容，其中没有任何实质意义到消息队列应用程序的应用程序。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the label contents, which have no intrinsic meaning to the Message Queuing application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LookupId As Long
public: property long LookupId { long get(); };

summary.span: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中引入。

span.span: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.

summary.span: 获取消息的查找标识符。

span.span: Gets the message's lookup identifier.

value.span: 消息的查找标识符，由消息队列生成，对消息驻留的队列是唯一的。

span.span: The message's lookup identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing and is unique to the queue where the message resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对消息的查找标识符的只读访问。The property provides read-only access to a message's lookup identifier. 在 MSMQ 3.0 中引入的查找标识符是一个 64 位标识符，由消息队列生成并将其分配到每条消息时该消息会放在队列中。The lookup identifier, introduced in MSMQ 3.0, is a 64-bit identifier that is generated by Message Queuing and assigned to each message when the message is placed in the queue. 查找标识符不是发送消息时生成的消息标识符相同。The lookup identifier is not the same as the message identifier that is generated when the message is sent. 消息队列会生成连接器和传出队列都将置于任何队列，包括应用程序生成的目标、 管理和报告队列，以及系统生成的日记、 死信的所有消息的查找标识符。Message Queuing generates a lookup identifier for all messages that are placed in any queue, including application-generated destination, administration, and report queues, as well as system-generated journal, dead-letter, connector, and outgoing queues. 换而言之，这包括这两个发送由发送应用程序和由消息队列的消息。In other words, this includes both messages sent by sending applications and by Message Queuing. 查找标识符是唯一的队列，并且队列外部没有意义。The lookup identifier is unique to the queue and has no meaning outside the queue. 如果消息发送到多个目标队列，或如果消息的副本存储在计算机日志或队列日志，位于其各自的队列中时，该消息的每个副本将具有其自己的查找标识符。If a message is sent to several destination queues, or if a copy of a message is stored in a computer journal or queue journal, each copy of the message will have its own lookup identifier when it is placed in its respective queue. 属性仅可读消息从队列中检索。The property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue. 查找标识符用于读取队列中的特定邮件。A lookup identifier is used to read a specific message in the queue. 接收应用程序后已知的一条消息的查找标识符，可以调用或函数直接转到该消息和扫视或检索从队列中，与不同的是必须从队列开头处的游标和队列末尾导航Once the lookup identifier of a message is known, the receiving application can call the or function to go directly to that message and peek at or retrieve it from the queue, unlike cursors that must start at the front of the queue and navigate towards the end of the queue, 获取队列中消息的查找标识符负责应用程序。Obtaining the lookup identifiers of the messages in the queue is the responsibility of the application. 若要获取的查找标识符的一种是创建缓存的每条消息的标识符，因为它们放置在队列中的组件时，将调用的目标队列的触发器。One possible way to obtain the lookup identifiers is to create a trigger for the destination queue that invokes a component that caches the identifiers of each message as they are placed in the queue.

value.span: 值之一。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息队列发送消息时，通常设置此属性。Message Queuing typically sets this property when it sends the message. 消息队列消息可以是下列类型之一：A Message Queuing message can be one of the following types: - `Normal`这典型消息从应用程序发送到队列，或响应消息返回到发送应用程序。`Normal`, which is either a typical message sent from an application to a queue, or a response message returned to the sending application. - `Acknowledgement`发送应用程序请求一个时，消息队列生成的。`Acknowledgement`, which Message Queuing generates whenever the sending application requests one. 例如，消息队列可生成肯定消息或否定消息，以指示原始消息已到达或已被读取。For example, Message Queuing can generate positive or negative messages to indicate that the original message arrived or was read. 消息队列会将相应的确认消息返回到发送应用程序所指定的管理队列。Message Queuing returns the appropriate acknowledgment message to the administration queue specified by the sending application. - `Report`只要源队列管理器中定义报告队列消息队列生成的。`Report`, which Message Queuing generates whenever a report queue is defined at the source Queue Manager. 如果启用了跟踪，则每当原始消息进入或离开消息队列服务器时，消息队列都会向消息队列报告队列发送报告消息。When tracing is enabled, Message Queuing sends a report message to the Message Queuing report queue each time the original message enters or leaves a Message Queuing server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::MessagePriority Priority { System::Messaging::MessagePriority get(); void set(System::Messaging::MessagePriority value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置消息优先级，该优先级用于确定消息在队列中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which determines where in the queue the message is placed.

value.span: 值之一，表示非事务性消息的优先级。

span.span: One of the values, which represent the priority levels of non-transactional messages.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会影响消息队列处理消息的方式这两个路由时，一旦它到达其目的地。The property affects how Message Queuing handles the message both while it is en route and once it reaches its destination. 在路由过程中，优先级高的消息具有优先权，将会插入到目标队列的队首。Higher-priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the destination queue. 而具有相同优先级的消息则会按照到达的先后时间插入到队列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time. 你可以设置非事务性消息才有意义的优先级。You can set a meaningful priority only for non-transactional messages. 消息队列将自动设置到的事务性消息的优先级`Lowest`，这将导致产生事务性消息优先级被忽略。Message Queuing automatically sets the priority for transactional messages to `Lowest`, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同的优先级别的消息发送到队列，并随后检索它们。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Recoverable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在出现计算机故障或网络问题时是否保证传递消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is guaranteed to be delivered in the event of a computer failure or network problem.

value.span: 如果通过在消息传递过程中将消息保存到磁盘上来保证消息的传递，则为 ；如果不能保证传递，则为 。

span.span: if delivery of the message is guaranteed (through saving the message to disk while en route); if delivery is not assured.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否保证消息的传递 — 即使消息启用路由到目标队列的过程中出现计算机故障。The property indicates whether the delivery of a message is guaranteed—even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果保证消息的传递，消息是本地存储在路由过程中，每个步骤直到消息成功转发到下一台计算机。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step along the route, until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 设置属性`true`可能会影响吞吐量。Setting the property to `true` could affect throughput. 如果消息是事务性的消息队列会自动将消息视为可恢复，而不考虑的值属性。If the message is transactional, Message Queuing automatically treats the message as recoverable, regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识接收应用程序生成的响应消息，接收应用程序返回到发送应用程序的队列。The property identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages, which the receiving application returns to the sending application. 当应用程序发送其消息时，发送应用程序会指定响应队列。The sending application specifies response queues when the application sends its messages. 任何可用队列均可指定为响应队列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 返回到响应队列的消息是应用程序特定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 应用程序必须定义消息的内容以及收到消息时采取的操作。The application must define the contents of the messages as well as the action to take upon receipt of a message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

span.span: Gets or sets the security certificate used to authenticate messages.

span.span: An array of byte values that represents a security certificate, which Message Queuing uses to verify the sender of the message.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的数组。

span.span: The default is a zero-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用属性时该消息包含的外部安全证书。The receiving application uses the property when the message includes an external security certificate. 消息队列可以进行身份验证使用一条消息的内部或外部的安全证书。Message Queuing can authenticate a message using either an internal or external security certificate. 消息队列提供了内部证书，用来验证消息的完整性。Message Queuing provides internal certificates, which are used to verify message integrity. 证书颁发机构提供的外部证书，这可以通过访问消息的属性。A certification authority provides an external certificate, which you can access through the property of the message. 除了允许消息队列进行身份验证消息的外部证书允许接收应用程序中，可以进一步验证发件人。In addition to allowing Message Queuing to authenticate the message, an external certificate allows the receiving application to further verify the sender. 内部证书的接收应用程序没有可用值。An internal certificate has no usable value to a receiving application. 必须与目录服务的消息队列系统注册的外部证书。An external certificate must be registered with the directory service of the Message Queuing system. 外部证书包含证书颁发机构、 证书用户、 证书的有效期，证书用户和证书颁发机构签名的公钥有关的信息。An external certificate contains information about the certification authority, the certificate user, the validity period of the certificate, the public key of the certificate user, and the certification authority's signature.

span.span: Gets the identifier of the sending user.

value.span: 接收队列管理器在对消息进行身份验证时使用标识符 — 以验证消息的发送方和发送方对队列的访问权限。

span.span: The receiving Queue Manager uses the identifier when it authenticates the message to verify the sender of the message and the sender's access rights to the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`false`中, 指定的发件人标识符属性未附加到消息，发送时。If the property is `false`, the sender identifier specified in the property is not attached to the message when it is sent. 这指示消息队列将消息发送到目标队列时，应不验证发件人。This indicates to Message Queuing that the sender should not be validated when it sends the message to the destination queue. 如果属性是`true`、属性值是可信仅当消息已验证。If the property is `true`, the property value is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated. 使用属性与结合属性以验证发件人的访问权限。Use the property in conjunction with the property to verify the sender's access rights. 连接器应用程序是使用连接器服务器来提供消息队列和其他队列系统之间的通信的应用程序。A connector application is an application that uses a connector server to provide communication between Message Queuing and other queuing systems. 消息队列要求连接器应用程序提供发送方标识。Message Queuing requires connector applications to provide sender identification. 必须设置时通过连接器应用程序发送消息的属性。You must set the property when sending a message through a connector application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan TimeToBeReceived { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要从目标队列接收消息所需的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time for the message to be received from the destination queue.

value.span: 从目标队列接收已发送消息所需的总时间。

span.span: The total time for a sent message to be received from the destination queue.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定发送的消息从目标队列接收的总时间。The property specifies the total time for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 时间限制包括到达目标队列和所用之前接收到消息队列中等待的时间所用的时间。The time limit includes the time spent getting to the destination queue and the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is received. > [!CAUTION] > 在使用从属客户端计算机，请确保客户端计算机上的时钟与正在运行消息队列服务器上的时钟同步。When using dependent client computers, be sure the clock on the client computer is synchronized with the clock on the server that is running Message Queuing. 否则，可能会导致不可预知的行为，发送消息时其属性不是。Otherwise, unpredictable behavior might result when sending a message whose property is not . 如果指定的间隔属性过期之前从队列中删除消息，消息队列将放弃两种方式之一中的消息。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message is removed from the queue, Message Queuing discards the message in one of two ways. 如果消息的 属性为 `true`，则将该消息发送到死信队列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果是`false`，则忽略此消息。If is `false`, the message is ignored. 你可以设置消息的属性来请求，消息队列将否定确认消息发送回发送应用程序如果计时器过期之前未检索到的消息。You can set the message's property to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message is not retrieved before the timer expires. 如果指定的值属性小于指定的值属性，优先。If the value specified by the property is less than the value specified by the property, takes precedence. 在单个事务中发送多条消息，消息队列使用的第一条消息的属性。When several messages are sent in a single transaction, Message Queuing uses the property of the first message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取或设置消息到达队列所用的最长时间。

value.span: 从发送消息的时间开始算起，消息到达目标队列的时间限制。

span.span: The time limit for the message to reach the destination queue, beginning from the time the message is sent.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的间隔属性期满在消息到达其目标之前，消息队列将放弃两种方式之一中的消息。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message reaches its destination, Message Queuing discards the message in one of two ways. 如果消息的 属性为 `true`，则将该消息发送到死信队列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果是`false`，则忽略此消息If is `false`, the message is ignored 你可以设置他消息属性来请求，消息队列将否定确认消息发送回发送应用程序如果消息没有到达之前在计时器过期。You can set he message's property to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message does not arrive before the timer expires. 如果属性设置为 0 秒，消息队列一次尝试将消息发送到其目标 — 如果队列等待消息。If the property is set to 0 seconds, Message Queuing tries once to send the message to its destination—if the queue is waiting for the message. 如果本地队列，消息总是到达它。If the queue is local, the message always reaches it. 如果指定的值属性大于指定的值属性，优先。If the value specified by the property is greater than the value specified by the property, takes precedence. 在单个事务中发送多条消息，消息队列使用的第一条消息的属性。When several messages are sent in a single transaction, Message Queuing uses the property of the first message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取曾包含消息的事务的标识符。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收应用程序使用属性以验证消息已发送特定事务的一部分。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction. 事务的事务标识符包含的标识符的 4 字节事务序列号后跟发送计算机 （第一个 16 位）。The transaction identifier contains the identifier of the sending computer (first 16 bits) followed by a 4-byte transaction sequence number. 此属性是仅适用于消息队列版本 2.0 及更高版本。This property is available only for Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 不保证事务标识符都是唯一的因为事务序列号不是永久性的而且它们处重新开始 2 20。Transaction identifiers are not guaranteed to be unique, because transaction sequence numbers are not persistent, and they start over again at 2 20. 消息队列仅保证，后续的事务将具有不同的事务序列号。Message Queuing guarantees only that subsequent transactions will have different transaction sequence numbers. 你可以使用属性连同和若要验证事务边界的属性。You can use the property along with the and properties to verify transaction boundaries. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识阅读回执确认收到连接器应用程序的源计算机上的事务性队列。The property identifies the transactional queue on the source computer that receives read-receipt acknowledgments from connector applications. 消息队列设置的属性，并检索事务性消息发送到外部队列时，连接器应用程序将使用属性。Message Queuing sets the property, and connector applications use the property when retrieving transactional messages sent to foreign queues. 非 Microsoft 消息队列的队列系统中不存在外队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. 与此类通过连接器应用程序的队列，消息队列进行通信。Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. 连接器应用程序可以使用的事务状态队列发送确认消息返回到发送应用程序。The connector application can use the transaction status queue to send acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 即使发送应用程序不会请求其他确认的事务状态队列应接收这些确认。The transaction status queue should receive these acknowledgments even if the sending application does not request other acknowledgments. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一条消息的值属性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

exception.span: 消息尚未发送。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示消息发送前是否验证了（或是否必须验证）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message was (or must be) authenticated before being sent.

value.span: 如果发送应用程序请求对消息进行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sending application requested authentication for the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否需要进行身份验证消息。The property specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 如果发送应用程序请求身份验证，消息队列创建数字签名，并使用它来发送时对消息进行签名和时将会收到该消息进行身份验证。If the sending application requests authentication, Message Queuing creates a digital signature and uses it to sign the message when it is sent and authenticate the message when it is received. 如果是`false`和一条消息发送到的队列，只接受经过身份验证的消息，在到达队列时，将被拒绝消息。If is `false` and a message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue. 无法确定消息是否未通过查看其属性通过身份验证。You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties. 它们传递到队列之前，消息队列将放弃此类消息。Message Queuing discards such messages before they are delivered to the queue. 但是，你可以请求如果传送失败可以阻止一条消息到达队列中发送确认消息。However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents a message from arriving in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseDeadLetterQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将未能传递的消息的副本发送到死信队列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue.

value.span: 如果消息传递失败应导致向死信队列发送消息的副本，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if message-delivery failure should result in a copy of the message being sent to a dead-letter queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性指定消息队列如何跟踪消息。The and properties specify how Message Queuing tracks a message. 如果是`true`，（的非事务性消息） 的传递失败将导致消息发送到无法传递消息的计算机上的非事务性死信队列。If is `true`, delivery failure (of a non-transactional message), causes the message to be sent to the non-transactional dead-letter queue on the computer that could not deliver the message. 传送失败可能引起消息计时器过期时，例如。Delivery failure could be caused by a message timer expiring, for example. 对于事务性消息的传送失败，消息队列为事务性死信队列中所有负数，有疑问的情况下在源计算机上发送消息。In the case of delivery failure for a transactional message, Message Queuing sends the message to the transactional dead-letter queue on the source machine in all negative and in-doubt cases. 当你将消息存储在死信队列时，则应该清除定期要删除不再需要的消息的队列。When you store messages in a dead-letter queue, you should clear the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 存储在死信队列计数针对队列所驻留的计算机的大小配额的消息。Messages stored in dead-letter queues count against the size quota for the computer where the queue resides. 计算机配额由管理员设置，并分配用于存储消息的整个计算机上，而不仅仅是在单个队列的大小是指。The computer quota is set by the administrator and refers to the size allocated for storing messages on the whole computer, not just in a single queue. 不要创建日志或死信队列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 这些是消息队列生成两个系统队列。These are both system queues that Message Queuing generates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to make the message private.

value.span: 要求消息队列加密消息时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to require Message Queuing to encrypt the message; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息是私有的其正文已加密之前发送和接收时解密。If a message is private, its body is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted when it is received. 若要发送私有消息，发送应用程序必须指定要使用加密和 （可选） 的加密算法。To send a private message, the sending application must specify that encryption be used and, optionally, the encryption algorithm. 发送私有消息时，则不需要执行的消息加密你的应用程序。When sending private messages, your application does not need to perform the message encryption. 如果你的应用程序正在发送中的 Microsoft Windows 2000 企业中，该组可以对目录服务的访问的消息，消息队列可以为你加密消息正文。Message Queuing can encrypt the message body for you if your application is sending messages within a Microsoft Windows 2000 enterprise, which has access to the directory service. 在接收时私有消息，接收队列管理器将始终解密消息正文。When receiving private messages, the receiving Queue Manager always decrypts the message body. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在始发计算机的计算机日记中保留消息的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer.

value.span: 在成功地将消息从始发计算机传输到下一个服务器后，要求在始发计算机的计算机日记中保留消息副本时为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to require that a copy of a message be kept in the originating computer's machine journal after the message has been successfully transmitted (from the originating computer to the next server); otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性指定消息队列如何跟踪消息。The and properties specify how Message Queuing tracks a message. 如果是`true`，然后在传输消息的每个步骤处的源计算机上的计算机日志保留副本。If is `true`, then a copy is kept in the computer journal on the originating machine at each step that a message is transmitted. 目标队列是否在远程计算机上，发送的消息是仅复制到日记队列中。The sent message is only copied to the journal queue if the destination queue is on a remote computer. 如果目标为本地计算机上，该消息被直接发送到队列，则为没有中间步骤需要日记记录。If the destination is on the local computer, the message is sent directly to the queue; there are no intermediate steps to require journaling. 当将消息存储在日记队列中时，清除定期要删除不再需要的消息的队列。When you store messages in a journal queue, clear the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 针对队列所驻留的计算机的配额的日记队列计数中存储的消息。Messages stored in journal queues count against the quota for the computer where the queue resides. （计算机配额设置管理员。）(The computer quota is set by the administrator.) 不要创建日志或死信队列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 这些是消息队列生成两个系统队列。These are both system queues that Message Queuing generates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在消息向目标队列移动的过程中跟踪消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to trace a message as it moves toward its destination queue.

value.span: 如果在发往目标队列的过程中，由原始消息产生的每个中间步骤都生成发送给系统报告队列的报告，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if each intermediate step made by the original message en route to the destination queue generates a report to be sent to the system's report queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否向其目标队列移动跟踪消息的路由。The property specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`，（由消息队列生成） 报告消息发送到报告队列每次该消息通过消息队列的路由服务器。If `true`, a report message (generated by Message Queuing) is sent to a report queue each time the message passes through a Message Queuing routing server. 源队列管理器指定的报告队列。The report queue is specified by the source Queue Manager. 报告队列并不局限于由消息队列; 生成的报告消息你应用程序生成的消息也可以发送到报告队列。Report queues are not limited to report messages generated by Message Queuing; your application-generated messages can also be sent to report queues. 使用跟踪包括设置 Active Directory 和指定报表队列的消息队列企业。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 管理员配置这些设置。The administrator configures these settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置的消息的值属性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.
